sample.protocol: Chemical fixation with PFA and Glutaraldehyde, followed by osmification, then on-section contrasting with uranyl acetate and lead citrate.
sample.contributions: Sample provided by Albert Cardona (HHMI Janelia). Sample fixed, stained, and embedded by Rick Fetter (HHMI Janelia). Sample heavy metal contrasting by Wei-Peng Lee (HHMI Janelia). Sample sectioned by David Peale and Harald Hess (both HHMI Janelia) with iTome. Sections imaged by David Peale (HHMI Janelia).
